quote: Your posture can have a great deal of influence on your personal presentation and image, revealing your attitude toward yourself and others.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today
category: branding, charisma, confidence, goals, hope, motivational, positivity, respect, style, wisdom

quote: Good posture is important for health reasons, as well as for your appearance, because it reflects your personal attitude.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today
category: branding, charisma, confidence, goals, hope, motivational, positivity, respect, style, wisdom

quote: More than attitude, posture has also been used throughout history to communicate one’s status in society.
author: Cindy Ann Peterson, My Style, My Way: Top Experts Reveal How to Create Yours Today
category: branding, charisma, confidence, goals, hope, motivational, positivity, respect, style, wisdom

quote: I learn by going where I have to go
author: Theodore Roethke

quote: The problem with setting goals is that they can be limiting.  Perhaps we're asking for something good when God's will is that we be given something great.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Life is a miracle and your most important goal in life is to protect this miracle. You have one more goal which is as important as this one and that is to protect the other miracles, the lives of others!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Managing a goal is the best way to guarantee reaching it.
author: Asuni LadyZeal

quote: Aim deliberately at goal.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Are you willing to self -sacrifice to achieve your goals?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita
category: determination, encouragement, goals, sacrifice, self-study, success

quote: Life is a chain of events; a journey. Tomorrow's opportunities are a reflection of today's decisions .The good thing is, tomorrow never ends. Every new day comes with a chance to secure tomorrow
author: Asuni LadyZeal

quote: Who doesn't enjoy a little gardening? As we plant the seeds and remove the weeds we reap a wonderful harvest of blessings. What are the weeds? Anyone or anything that sucks the nutrients from the seeds we have planted. The seeds are our goals, desires, good thoughts and feelings. good works and deeds anything that uplifts us. If we don't keep up on our weeding then our garden will die.
author: Lindsey Rietzsch, Successful Failures: Recognizing the Divine Role That Opposition Plays in Life's Quest for Success
category: analogies, desires-quotes, gardening, goals, good-thoughts, good-works, inspirational-quotes, motivational-speaker, negative-people, seeds, seeds-for-success

quote: Jump high brother!! So high that if you fall, then people should remark on not how far you fell but how high you jumped
author: Anubhav Mishra

quote: At times, it is better to "just do it" than to "do it right". One reason new year resolutions don't work is because we expect too much from ourselves. Rush, meet your deadlines, you can always continue from where you stopped next year.
author: Asuni LadyZeal

quote: Never ask me to reach for the moon when all I want is to hold your hand." -- Fidelis O Mkparu, author of 'Love's Affliction
author: Fidelis O. Mkparu

quote: You don't set out to build a wall. You don't say: 'I'm going to build the biggest, baddest, greatest wall that's ever been built.' You say, "I'm going to lay this brick as perfectly as a brick can be laid. You do that every single day. And soon you have the greatest wall that's ever been built." - Will Smith
author: Sam Thomas Davies, Unhooked: How to Break Bad Habits and Form Good Ones That Stick

quote: A life without goals is like flotsam that is governed by the tides and winds of fate.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is Simply A Game

quote: With grace you can realise your goals.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Goals are the source of misery. An unattained goal causes pain, but actually achieving it brings only a brief satisfaction.
author: Matt Haig, Reasons to Stay Alive

quote: There is a special sadness in achievement, in the knowledge that a long-desired goal has been attained at last, and that life must now be shaped towards new ends.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Stop obsessing about where you invest your money.Focus instead, on where you invest your time.
author: Gyan Nagpal, Talent Economics: The Fine Line Between Winning and Losing the Global War for Talent

quote: You may not have covered your set tracks but it’s never too late to start.
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue
category: achievement, ambition, goals, late, never-too-late, set-goals, start, start-all-over-again, start-over, tracks, winning

quote: The secret to living your life to its potential is to value the important stuff above your own comfort. Therefore, the critical first step to executing well is creating and maintaining a compelling vision of the future that you want even more than you desire your own short-term comfort, and then aligning your shorter term goals and plans, with that long-term vision.
author: Brian P. Moran, The 12 Week Year

quote: Struggle only when if its absolute necessity, if you will struggle on every step you can never reach up to the goal.
author: Bijendra Kumar, Three Jobless Freaks
category: author, engineers, freshers, goals, jobless, joblessness, jobs, love, struggle, struggles

quote: There are things in life you hope to do some day - like ride in a hot air balloon or go to Paris- and there are things that you know you will never do because, in a nutshell, the desire isn't there.
author: Alice J. Wisler, How Sweet It Is

quote: Your career has but one goal: To ensure your book of life is more than an anthology of salary slips.
author: Gyan Nagpal, Talent Economics: The Fine Line Between Winning and Losing the Global War for Talent

quote: Set out to be the person you know you can be. Thinking about it, and talking about it is the first step. If you can imagine it for yourself then you can do it. Take action!
author: Ron Baratono

quote: I love to write. But it has never gotten any easier to do and you can't expect it to if you keep trying for something better than you can do.
author: Ernest Hemingway, Ernest Hemingway on Writing
category: achievement, aspiration, challenge, craft-of-writing, goals, improvement, skill, writing, writing-goals

quote: The mind of an artist never sleeps, because dreaming is when they do their best work.
author: Mark W. Boyer

quote: What about you? What are you going to be?” I knew immediately I shouldn’t have asked. His smile faded, and he looked down at his hands in his lap. I’d about had enough of tiptoeing around his illness. “How do you expect God to heal you if you don’t even believe it?” I spoke firmly to make sure my own heart got the message as well. “I believe that you, Matthew Doyle, are going to be fine someday. So when I ask you what you want to do with your life, I ask cause I know you’re going to have a life! I’m tired of all this moping around waiting to die malarkey.” He raised his eyebrows and pushed himself forward in the chair. “I know what you believe, Ruby. You been saying it since the day you got here. And I ain’t getting any better. You’re just putting me in a position of disappointing you, and I can’t hardly stand that. Don’t you think I want a life?” “I don’t know. Do you?” “Of course I do!
author: Jennifer H. Westall, Healing Ruby

quote: If I didn't have enormous dreams, I wouldn't have come this far!
author: Mary Sage Nguyen

quote: He said little about his dream but he nourished it in his heart as the best place for a dream to grow.
author: Elizabeth Yates, Amos Fortune, Free Man

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: I am most thankful for what I don’t have, for had my life’s wish list been filled in the manner I had chosen I would be steeped in meaningless trinkets verses bathed in God’s treasures.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, An Intimate Collision: Encounters with Life and Jesus
category: blessings, desires, gifts, goals, god, greed, self-centered, self-centeredness, thankful, thankfulness, thanks, thanksgiving, treasures, trinkets

quote: I realized that the most empowering important thing was actually simply taking care of myself.
author: Aspen Matis, Girl in the Woods: A Memoir
category: aspen-matis, empowerment, goals, self-esteem, young-girl, young-woman

quote: What might be your current goal can motivate you in some situations. For like when you priority something and you have loose ends on it, it will make your back itch.
author: Alberto D. Bautista

quote: 4 Don’t Die™ Principles:•	Change your awareness and your perspective changes.•	You teach what you need to learn.•	You can make excuses or you can achieve your goals, but you cannot do both.•	Experience is what you get when you don’t get what you want.
author: Andrea T. Goeglein, Don't Die Waiting to Be Brave
category: achieve, awareness, change, excuses, experience, goals, learn, perspective, teach

quote: Imagine a tiny ant on the back of a massive African elephant. No matter how diligently that ant marches east, if the elephant he sits upon travels in the opposite direction, the ant will end up farther west than his starting point. Similarly, we will find ourselves receding from our goals if our conscious and subconscious minds are not aligned.
author: Vince Poscente

quote: I was promising myself strength.I had to write it, say it, make the effort and fake it before I actually believed I could do it.
author: Aspen Matis, Girl in the Woods: A Memoir

quote: Stop thinking of the past, and stop worrying about the future. Just win the day. Achieve the goals you set for every single day, and you’ll rebuild your life in a few short years.
author: Kevin J.  Donaldson

quote: I was the director of my life, it was already true, and I would soon lead myself to my dreamed-of destinations.It was the task of my one thousand miles of solitude.
author: Aspen Matis, Girl in the Woods: A Memoir

quote: You will be what you really want to be.
author: Debasish Mridha
category: debasish-mridha, dreams, goals, inspirational, philosophy, quotes, what-do-you-want-to-be

quote: A clear purpose will unite you as you move forward, values will guide your behavior, and goals will focus your energy.
author: Kenneth H. Blanchard, Collaboration Begins with You: Be a Silo Buster
category: behavior, collaboration, energy, goals, purpose, values

quote: I believe that there is potential in everyone, and that everyone is capable of reaching their goals and dreams with the right focus, dedication and discipline.
author: Dave Shepp

quote: Too much hurry will bury your goals. Too much haste will make you waste. Too quick race will cripple your pace. Be patient.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Ladder
category: bury, cripple, goals, gradual, harry, haste, patience, patient, quick, quick-money, race, rush, take-time, take-your-time, tarry, too-much, waste

quote: Understand that great accomplishments require great effort. If a goal is achieved without effort, it is no accomplishment but a mere happening.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
category: accomplishments, achievements, effort, goals, investment, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, work

quote: If the goal you've set for yourself has a 100 percent chance of success, then frankly you aren't aiming high enough.
author: Benny Lewis, Fluent in 3 Months: How Anyone at Any Age Can Learn to Speak Any Language from Anywhere in the World
category: benny-lewis, fluency, fluent-in-three-months, goals, goalsetting, language-learning, languages, polyglots, traveling

quote: Dreams are like holding on to a good book in your hands; you have the full story in your palms, but no matter how much you want to get to the end of the story, you have to go through all the pages first; and you are the writer.
author: T.H Maloa

quote: My vision of what God can do is nothing more than a fleeting glance of the backside of the ‘possible,’ while God is inviting me to the forefront of the ‘impossible.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, An Intimate Collision: Encounters with Life and Jesus
category: challenges, goals, god, impossibilities, impossible, opportunities, possibilities, possible, vision

quote: Motivation may be what starts you off, but it's habit that keeps you going back for more. Are your habits working for you or against you? Are your habits helping you to achieve your goals or hindering the process?
author: Miya Yamanouchi, Embrace Your Sexual Self: A Practical Guide for Women
category: achieving-your-goals, addicted, addiction, bad-habit, beginning, fitness, goal-setting, goals, habit, habits, habitual, health, motivated, motivation, motivational, new-start, vision, wellness, workout

quote: If your actions don’t reflect your goals… and your behavior doesn’t reflect your company’s vision… then you’re not a leader
author: regardless of what your title indicates.

quote: Keep going. You're a mess and you're happy.
author: Markus Zusak, The Book Thief

quote: Beware of those who steer you away from your heart’s true happiness. It would make them happy to see you steer yourself right next to them, sitting with both your hearts bitter.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem
category: achievement, ambitions, attitude, awareness, bitter, bitterness, competition, dreams, envy, faith, goals, happiness, jealousy, quotes, resent, resentment, steer, success

quote: When will you open your eyes to the possibility of the world?
author: Tony Curl
category: dreams, goals, inspiration, life, perspective, possibility

quote: I opened my eyes today to a world that felt alien. For though things resembled the familiar, nothing was the same. Walls I once considered confining, crumbled at the slightest shove. Mountains that for ages had barred my view now faded, transparent. Meandering roads stretched out as straight as an arrow, void of stop signs. Obstacles no longer stood stationary. Pinnacles loomed within reach. Beasts were tame, bullies timid, wagging tongues all tied into knots, and in the palm of my hand glistened the end of a glorious rainbow. It took but a moment to realize that in my newfound sight, everything I’d ever longed for was accessible. Incredibly, the only thing that had really changed was the way I saw the world.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: accomplishments, dreams, goals, making-wishes, outlook, perspective, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, seeing, wishes

quote: What in your life needs to be consigned to the bin? Just make sure it's not your dreams!
author: Tony Curl

quote: This is why, if I may be forgiven a digression, I believe it is time for the black race to forget about rhetoric and instead show what we are capable of doing. The testing will surely go on for the next generation and the next, but each time we meet the test, we'll climb another rung of the ladder until finally we arrive at parity, having earned our place rather than pleading or demanding that it be given to us.
author: Yvonne S. Thornton, The Ditchdigger's Daughters: A Black Family's Astonishing Success Story

quote: How many good ideas have you let go because you didn't believe in yourself? You have to believe to achieve!
author: Tony Curl

quote: Not asking questions: Giving up on your dreams: Settling for less than you deserve causes you pain, a pain owned by the majority. Be among the few who are inquisitive, forge plans to chase their dreams and take intentional action to live the life aligned with their potential.
author: Tony Curl

quote: I have no idea what to do, and everything is starting to feel dangerously hopeless. Hopelessness is not an emotion to be indulged. On the heels of hopelessness comes defeat, and even though everything seems pointless and impossible, I still want to win. Underneath my confusion and utter, bone-crushing fatigue, even though I don't know much of anything at all, I still know I want to win.
author: Carolyn Lee Adams, Ruthless
category: carolyn-lee-adams, goals, hope, hopelessness, perseverance, positivity, ruthless, ya

quote: Sometimes a goal in life we are striving for may seem dim or unreachable. Direction has suddenly changed so fast we’re left with aimless thoughts and confusion. Don’t be troubled! You’ve proved to yourself you have the drive. Your new direction will come with patience. Each of us need time to rest our heart and mind before we reach the next mountain.
author: Ron Baratono

quote: To achieve in life is A hard story, But that shouldn’t scare you.
author: Auliq Ice
category: achievements, aim, aim-high, goal-setting, goals, goals-in-life, life-success, success

quote: To achieve in life is A hard story, you're starting to get the picture. It's hard work, and this is just the beginning.
author: Auliq Ice
category: achievements, aim, aim-high, goal-setting, goals, goals-in-life, life-success, success

quote: Your obstinacy towards your goals gives you ignition which leads to your success.
author: omer dar

quote: Too often, many people choose goals that are not inspiring and empowering to them
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: To have more empowering goals, look within
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: When you confront, you get goals faster.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: We can let our goals motivate and inspire us, but we don’t want to let them determine our happiness or self worth.
author: Elaina Marie, Happiness is Overrated - Live the Inspired Life Instead

quote: Live your life each day as you would climb a mountain. An occasional glance toward the summit keeps the goal in mind, but many beautiful scenes are to be observed from each new vantage point.
author: Harold B. Melchart

quote: An ordinary teacher teaches how to accumulate information. A good teacher teaches how to assimilate information. A great teacher teaches how to stand up and turn every challenge into opportunities. An extraordinary teacher teaches how to be larger than life by following your own dreams, own goals and own instincts.
author: Amit Ray, Walking the Path of Compassion
category: assimilate, assimilation, challenge, dreams, goals, instinct-quotes, instincts, larger-than-life, opportunities, teacher, teacher-quotes, teachers, teachers-day, teachers-teaching

quote: We lie to reflect the aspirational goals that we unconsciously know we will not uphold.
author: Cortney S. Warren, Lies We Tell Ourselves: The Psychology of Self-Deception
category: aspire, goals, lie, reflect, unconscious, uphold

quote: Struggle for Your Goals, because its too much better than Struggling for Your Life.
author: Fahad Rashiq
category: because, break, breakberears, dont-give-up, dontgiveup, dreams, ego, fahad, fahadrashiq, foryour, foryourlife, goals, its, lesson, lessons, life, motivational, muchbetter, quotes, rashiq, struggle, struggling, than, too

quote: The NFL determines your worth as a player, but only God knows your true worth. Players work long and hard through pain and suffering, injuries, and pushing themselves further than they imagined going—then poof ! A dream is gone. That kind of treatment can really mess with one’s self worth. Getting cut can be deemed a failure, the loss of a lifetime goal.Thankfully, as Christians our worth is not determined by mistakes ￼we’ve made, either accidentally or by stupid stuff we’ve purposely done. Neither is it determined by what anyone else thinks. Our worth is determined by what Jesus Christ has already done.
author: Jake Byrne, First and Goal: What Football Taught Me About Never Giving Up
category: faith, football, goals, god, jesus-christ, mistakes, never-give-up, self-esteem, self-esteem-101, self-esteem-high, self-worth, worth, worthiness

quote: How responsible are you with what you are given? Are you the per- son who, when asked to do a job, can be counted on to get it done and get it done right? Don’t settle for just a field goal in life. Make the push for the last six inches and score a touchdown. Faithfulness, hard work, and dedication will gain the trust of others and take you further down the field.
author: Jake Byrne, First and Goal
category: faith, football, football-quotes, goals, god, responsibility, settling

quote: It has seemed to me that each year one should pause to take stock of himself, to ask: Where am I going? What am I becoming? What do I wish to do and become?Most people whom I encountered were without purpose, people who had given themselves no goal. The first goal need not be the final one, for a sailing ship sails first by one wind, then another. The point is that it is always going somewhere, proceeding toward a final destination.
author: Louis L'Amour

quote: To turn the page to the next chapter of a more satisfying life-as-adventure, these steps that have proved fruitful for me -- when I've actually followed them.1. Find Your True North to Become More JoyfulFirst be clear about choosing a goal that rings true. Forget "should" or adopting someone else's goal for you.2. Picture Being Your HeroAfraid you will fail? Supplant your fear with a greater motivation. When you are tempted to fall back, picture how you'll feel when you succeed. ." Rather than talking about what you are giving up or how you might fail, reflect upon and discuss the benefits you clearly see.3. Surround Yourself With Mutual Support SystemsTo keep your resolve, surround yourself with those who want you to succeed - and who are also on a path of practice. Agree on shared and individual behaviors that reinforce your mutual support. The authors of Influencer found that is the only way to permanently change.4. Involve Your Senses To Stay On Your PathTie your goal for your new chapter to your frequent experiences. Write it down. Say it out loud. Associate it with things you see, hear, smell, taste and touch every day. Plant sticky messages on your bathroom mirror, your car dashboard and smart device screen. Smell your shampoo and connect it with living that chapter. Brush your teeth and feel the motion towards it.5. Notice Where You Get DetouredNotice your pattern of avoidance. What activities get you sidetracked? What time of day or day of the week is it most likely to happen? What else is happening that can numb you into avoidance? What colleagues and friends help or hinder you on your path? Conversely, when are your stronger moments?6. Plan A Grand RewardThe bigger the change, the larger the reward you deserve. Enable others who supported you, to savor it with you. Since behavior is contagious to the third degree, you don't know which friends, and friends of your friends' friends might be moved, by your example, to also turn the page to the next chapter of the adventure story they were meant to live.
author: Kare Anderson, Moving From Me to We

quote: Abundant evidence exists to prove that we are continually creating excuses to explain why we do not reach our goals.
author: Andrea Goeglein
category: abundant, evidence, excuse, exist, explain, goals, reach

quote: It is not important who the leader is. Its important where they lead you to.
author: Amit Abraham

quote: The hallmark of great dreams is not their possibility but their impossibility, and the fact that it is the very notion of the ‘impossible’ that inspires us to go and accomplish them anyway.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
category: achieve, achievement, aspirations, dreams, goals, hopes, impossible, inspiration, inspire, possibilities, possible

quote: You can make excuses or you can achieve your goals, but you can't do both.
author: Andrea Gogelein

quote: Resurrect the dreams that you allowed to be killed by those who never dare to dream
author: Saccheen Laing

quote: Without goals we are nothing more than drifters, drifting where?
author: Marilyn L. Rice

quote: Never let anyone distract your focus from accomplishing great opportunities in your life .
author: Tawana Beecham

quote: Winning and losing is not an external game. It is an internal battle over telling yourself the truth vs. lies regarding why you haven’t stepped into the life you dreamed of.
author: Shannon L. Alder
category: actions, choices, comfort-zone, decisions, doing, dreams, fear, generalizing, goals, internal-conflict, losing, negative-dialogue, negative-expectations, negative-thoughts, overthinking, rationalizing, settling, winning

quote: Aim low and you won't be disappointed.
author: Chuck Palahniuk, Make Something Up: Stories You Can't Unread

quote: If you can't reach your dreams,If you can't achieve your goals,If you can't meet your plans,Least be happy each daySuccess is not an annual achievement,It's a daily achievement.
author: Bradley B. Dalina
category: achievements, bradley, bradley-b-dalina, dreams, goals, plans, success

quote: Knowledge only becomes wisdom, when it is utilized and produces fruit that makes it possibleto reach the goals that God has set.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: God determines the goals of the prosperity before giving prosperity to His children.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Sometimes we get off course, desiring things or setting goals that will lead to no good end. But if our desire is in the right place, loving Jesus and loving others, there is no telling where Jesus can take us.
author: Richard Foth, A Trip Around the Sun: Turning Your Everyday Life Into the Adventure of a Lifetime

quote: Money should never be the goal. It should only be the means of attaining the goal.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Management should have goals.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Goals have a way of refocusing your life. They give you purpose and a target to shoot for. They are the compass of our dreams, helping us set a steady course. Goals comprise direction and progress. When we lose sight of our goals, we tend to lose sight of ourselves and who we are trying to become, who God has made us to be.
author: Richard Foth

quote: A set and concrete term of attaining a plan mobilizes a man to fulfill it.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: God approves our life if we attain His goals.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The aspiration to attain goals overcomes death
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: God changes His time because His goals and tasks change.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To accomplish your goals and purposes in life you must be constantly refreshed by Him.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: In order to have success, you have to concentrate on your goals.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Don’t think about what can happen in a month. Don’t think about what can happen in a year. Just focus on the 24 hours in front of you and do what you can to get closer to where you want to be.
author: Eric Thomas

quote: May it not be that he loves chaos and destruction (there can be no disputing that he does sometimes love it) because he is instinctively afraid of attaining his object and completing the edifice he is constructing? Who knows, perhaps he only loves that edifice from a distance, and is by no means in love with it at close quarters; perhaps he only loves building it and does not want to live in it, but will leave it, when completed...
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Notes from Underground, White Nights, The Dream of a Ridiculous Man, and Selections from The House of the Dead
category: abandonment, attainment, chaos, destruction, goals, human-nature, reaching-your-goals, success

quote: An anomaly has his own ambitions. You can try reasoning with him, but that's like using money to bribe a beast.
author: Criss Jami, Healology
category: ambition, animal, anomaly, artist, beast, bribery, different, goals, materialism, misunderstood, money, odd, original, perseverance, persistence, reason, strange, success, unique, unstoppable, weird

quote: Stop looking for a partner. Focus on your goals and rebuilding your life. The right person will eventually find their way to you.
author: Robert Tew

quote: Personally, I like to sleep. And I intend to appropriately confine myself more and more to my living quarters and pass my life away sleeping.
author: Tsunetomo Yamamoto

quote: Calm for too long begs the question of whether we're in an all-out pursuit of life, or we're all-out of the pursuit of life.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
category: determination, dreams, goals, god, life, pursuit, vision

quote: You cannot pursue all your goals simultaneously or satisfy all your desires at once. And it's an emotional drain to think you can. Instead, you must focus on long-term fulfillment rather than short-term success and, at various points in your life, think carefully about your priorities.
author: Eric C. Sinoway

quote: The power to reach our goal is always in the moment. When the moment arrives, be ready to perform the action that will help you reach your goal, and be aware when the moment is now.
author: Russell Eric Dobda

quote: Without unreservedly surrendering myself to God, whatever place I might raise myself to remains nothing more than a step or possibly two off the hard basement floor of life, for of myself I can be utterly assured that I will never step out of the basement.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough, Flecks of Gold on a Path of Stone: Simple Truths for Profound Living
category: goals, god, journey, life, progress, raise, reliance, self, surrender

quote: Travis: Happy anniversary,Pidge.Abby: One down, forever to go.
author: Jamie McGuire, A Beautiful Wedding

quote: Don't let a strong wind blow you over, take flight upon it.
author: Rob Liano
category: adversity, flight, goals, inspiration, motivation, motivational-quote, upward

quote: Goal setting is good stewardship. Instead of letting things happen, goals help us make things happen. Instead of living by default, goals help us live by design. Instead of living out of memory, goals help us live out of imagination.
author: Mark Batterson, The Circle Maker: Praying Circles Around Your Biggest Dreams and Greatest Fears

quote: Any decision can be easier if you think carefully about your goals; the dimensions of yourself that are most important to you; your needs and wants; the specific costs and benefits associated with your choices; the commensurability of those choices; and whether certain goals should be sequenced instead of pursued simultaneously to give you a better chance of success. Instead of striving for work–life balance, or even worrying about juggling on the balance beam, use this framework to pursue your life’s work—holistically seeking both success and satisfaction.
author: Eric C. Sinoway

quote: Don't let their chaos distract you from your goals.
author: Willi Way

quote: If you don’t have something worth pursuing then life becomes dull and days become long
author: Luthando Daniels

quote: Short term goals are often based on dissatisfaction, and actions based on dissatisfaction will eventually lead to a life of unhappiness.
author: Gudjon Bergmann, Yes! You Can Manage Stress

quote: Doesn’t make any difference how hard the thing is or how much you want to do something else. Do the thing you first started and do it as well as you possibly can.
author: Annie Roe Carr

quote: To dream of success is to set a goal of where you want to be; to wake up, take action, and achieve it is what true success is all about.
author: Idowu Koyenikan, Wealth for All Africans: How Every African Can Live the Life of Their Dreams

quote: You will find there are times you must grasp your life with both hands and forcefully steer it in a new direction and then strain to hold your course until the storms of fear, weakness, and doubt abate.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: altering, change, changes-in-life, doubt, goals, improvements, overcoming, overcoming-fear, overcoming-weaknesses, resolutions, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, transformation

quote: When what you value and dream about doesn’t match the life you are living, you have pain.
author: Shannon L. Alder
category: actions, alignment, blueprints, boundaries, consistency, creating-an-amazing-life, directions, dreams, expectations, goals, in-sync, lessons, life-expectations, life-plan, life-purpose-101, pain, plan, principles, self-expectations, self-imposed-pain, teachers, teaching, values, what-you-want

quote: My dear fellow, it isn't easy to be anything nowadays. There's such a lot of beastly competition about.
author: Oscar Wilde, The Importance of Being Earnest

quote: Raging fires grow from the tiniest spark; it is the same principle at work in life. As long as there's a spark, tend to your fire. Never give up.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: determination, dreams, goals, never-give-up, perseverance, resolutions, resolve, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich

quote: Something that is set can be broken, so are society standards and limits.
author: Unarine Ramaru
category: aim-high, drive, goal-setting, goals, limits, postive-thinking, social-standards, urge

quote: Think of how far you've come," Maggie said softly. "And then ask yourself how much farther you wish to go
author: Thrity Umrigar, The Story Hour

quote: A goal will always tell you where you don't want to be.
author: Shannon L. Alder
category: ambition, choices, decisions, goals, life, reminders, starting-points

quote: Discipline means choices. Every time you say yes to a goal or objective, you say no to many more.
author: Sybil Stanton

quote: Some of the people who would tell you that you wouldn't be able to accomplish your dream, are the same ones who would tell you that they knew that you would do big things in life. Please don't ever let anyone talk you out of your positive mental imagination.
category: doing-big-things-in-life, dreams, edmond-mbiaka, goal, goals, people-who-doubt-you, your-mental-imagination, your-mental-sight, your-positive-mental-imagination

quote: I did not get to where I am backstabbing people. If you want what I have, you must earn it like I did.
author: Andres Oliver

quote: You can't be attending to your dream only when you perfectly feel like doing so. Its pursuit has to become a big part of your daily life.
category: attending-to-your-dream, attennd-to-your-dream, dreams, edmond-mbiaka, goal, goals, the-pursuit-of-your-dream, working-on-your-dream, your-daily-life, your-dream-has-to-consume-you

quote: If others benefit through you getting what you desire most,it will have a positive impact on the world and only then will every atom of your being work with the universe to help it come into fruition.
author: Malti Bhojwani, The Mind Spa Ignite Your Inner Life Coach

quote: When you have a plan in your mind of what the best life is for you, but it doesn't match your life, you have pain.
author: Shannon L. Alder
category: action, anxiety, avoiding, choices, conflict, creating, denial, fear, goal-setting, goals, inner-peace, lack-of-courage, life, making-goals, mapping-your-life, moving-forward, pain, planning, plans, procrastination, putting-off, what-is-it-you-want, why-do-you-want-it

quote: Even the least of our activities ought to have some end in view.
author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quote: Don’t set your sights low, just because someone else has a limited view of life’s possibilities. One person's comfort zone may be another person's cage.
author: Eleanor Brownn

quote: The goal of a life purpose is not what you will create, but what it will make you into for creating it.
author: Shannon L. Alder
category: a-resource, achieving-vs-becoming, better-person, character, confident, fulfillment, goals, happiness, hard-working, knowledge, legacy, life-purpose, mature, maturity, spiritual-growth, success, virtues, what-people-remember-about-you, wisdom

quote: To avoid the cost incurred in pursuing great things we opt for ease and blithely abandon great things. The sheer recklessness of such a pathetically apathetic trade-off will eventually cost us a life squandered, which in the end is the greatest cost of all.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
category: calling, challenges, ease, entitlement, fear, foolishness, goals, god, mediocrity, vision

quote: How often do I stand in abject terror and raw trepidation before the impossible peaks that soar to impossible heights in front me, when God turns to me and calmly says “what mountains?
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
category: barriers, challenges, faith, fear, frightened, goals, god, obstacles, tenacity

quote: That stormy day in the desert, however, much changed for me. We must have our goals, our dreams and we must strive for them. We are not gods, however; we do not have the power to shape every aspect of the future. And the road the world makes for us is one that teaches humility if we are willing to learn.
author: Dean Koontz, Forever Odd
category: change, dreams, goals, humility, life, odd-thomas, storms

quote: The more I accomplish, the more I know I'm capable of accomplishing.
author: Tawny Lara
category: accomplish, accomplishment, accomplishments, bhag, capability, goal-setting, goals, goals-in-life, goals-quotes, life-goals, lululemon, tenacity

quote: And how will you afford to buy them in the first place?""I shall save up.""But that will take you years and years and years," said the twins."I've got years and years and years," said Sophie.
author: Dick King-Smith

quote: I'm not out to make everybody happy. I'm out to make the right people happy.
author: W.J. Raymond
category: dreams, goals, happiness, happy, inspiration, live-in-the-moment

quote: Your goals and dreams desperately need your consistent actions right at this very moment, and the future will surely judge and reward you based on how often and well you attend to them.

I started achieving a lot of things in a shorter period of time when I decided to start focusing on fewer goals, along with devoting more time and energy on them on a daily basis. Doing too many things all at the same time doesn't always result to productivity.
category: achieving-your-goals, devoting-your-time-and-energy, edmond-mbiaka, focusing-on-fewer-things, focusing-on-less-goals, goals

quote: Do not get caught pursuing the goals of who you used to be instead of who you are.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Learning to Live through Jiu Jitsu

quote: The more specifically you define your goals the more attainable they become.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Learning to Live through Jiu Jitsu

quote: If you are yet to cross the victory lines of your endeavors, you definitely haven't done your best. There will always more left in you to give to your goals and dreams.
category: dreams, edmond-mbiaka, goals, libe, there-is-more-left-in-you, victory-lines, your-endeavors-in-life

quote: Nothing is less productive than to make more efficient what should not be done at all.
author: Peter F. Drucker

quote: A steadfast heart does not stray from the path.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman, Kaya Abaniah and the Father of the Forest
category: confidence, determination, faithfulness, fidelity, goals, loyalty, perseverance, quotable, reliability, righteousness, sense-of-purpose

quote: The reason most people never reach their goals is that they don’t define them, or ever seriously consider them as believable or achievable. Winners can tell you where they are going, what they plan to do along the way, and who will be sharing the adventure with them.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Only those prepared to go too far will learn how far they can go.
author: CrimethInc., Contradictionary
category: accomplishments, anarchism, anarchy, crimethinc, extreme, goals

quote: Each of us has empty spaces in our heart that go through life being filled temporarily, by the various people we meet along the way. The trick is to find what needs to remain permanently filled in our soul and what needs to be filled occasionally through encounters.
author: Shannon L. Alder
category: centered, choices, complete, desires, dreams, empty-spaces, feeling-full, fulfilled, goals, happiness, knowing-yourself, life-direction, life-purpose, needs, not-empty, oneness, stayingpositiveu-com, wants

quote: Every writer should know their target. Aim for the heart ~ hit that and all which follows is sheer ecstasy.
author: Muse
category: aim-for-the-heart, be-a-better-writer, craft-of-writing, goals, how-to-write, poet, poets, why-i-write, word-craft, writer, writing, writing-tips

quote: It is far too easy to discover complacency in mediocrity. Success is rooted in extreme ambition, implanted by divine guidance, and is achieved long before others are able to see it. Surprise them all, but you know this…you are already there.
author: Carl Henegan, Darkness Left Undone

quote: Don't let people get the best of you they say what they want but don't let that distract you from accomplishing your goals.
author: Alcurtis Turner

quote: Some people will try to talk you out of chasing your goals; not because they think you’ll fail, but because they are scared you’ll succeed.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: As long as you have goals to accomplish in this life, you will not truly be complete.
author: kamar brown

quote: Every advancing step I take toward my goal of comfort is yet another retreating step I take away from God's goal of the impossible.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
category: comfort, fear, goals, god, impossible, mediocrity, passive

quote: They act as if their religion were a celestial gumball machine, taking no blame for personal failures because they won't manifest their will in the real world by working for their goals.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Pagan Standard Times: Essays on the Craft
category: entitlement, failures, goals, gumball, religion, will

quote: Constantly re-evaluating your purpose is the best way to ensure that you are pursuing the goals of who you are and not who you used to be.
author: Chris Matakas, #Human: Learning To Live In Modern Times

quote: If it has to be it's up to me.
author: Anonymous

quote: Good enough may be an acceptable end, but it should never be an acceptable goal.
author: James Rozoff

quote: A crafter's vision never completely survives the journey from mind to reality.
author: Tag Cavello, Regions of Passion

quote: By connecting and being part of a community with a shared vision and goals, we can create great things.
author: David J. Greer, Wind In Your Sails

quote: Having a set of goals is a good thing for many people. But when a goal takes your focus off God and His daily intentions for you, it can cause trouble. Being driven by my plans can shift the focus of my heart from following God and being open to His unfolding invitations, to following only that which leads me closer to my desires. For me, I started falling into a trap of making plans each day around what I wanted to see happen. Anything that wasn’t part of my plan became a distraction and an unwelcome interruption.
author: Lysa TerKeurst

quote: A conviction borne of God amply possesses the potency and power to brazenly reach beyond the possible in order to topple the impossible.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
category: brave, bravery, goals, god, impossible, possible

quote: If I am always standing at the bottom of the mountain longingly looking up, in all probability it is because I have heeded the pillaging dogma of mediocrity which persistently tells me that the dream is not worth the climb.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
category: challenges, dreams, goals, mediocrity, mountains, sacrifice

quote: The only day you should never write and achieve your goals is when the day ends with the letter y.
author: Onyi Anyado
category: brainy-quote, distinction, entrepreneur, entrepreneur-quotes, entrepreneurship, goal-of-life, goal-setting-tips, goals, goals-priorities, goals-quotes, goals-quotes-goal-setting-quotes, leadership, leadership-development, onyi-anyado, onyi-anyado-richard-branson, quote-of-the-week, quotes, quotes-of-the-day

quote: When you decide to be all you can be you will be better for it
author: Blake L. Higginbotham

quote: Let go of your past. Start making history!
author: Julie Connor, Dreams to Action Trailblazer's Guide
category: action, dreams, follow-your-dreams, future-goals, future-plans, goals, resolution

quote: You experience true happiness when the things you desire rise up to the level of the things you deserve.
author: Robert J. Braathe

quote: I am what no one else is, and in the hands of God I can do what no one else does. And if I dare set such a truth in motion I will change my world.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough
category: goals, god, god-s-will, self-confidence, self-esteem, unique, uniqueness

quote: Who told you that your journey was a thousand miles
author: John Lomacang, Abandoned but Not Alone My Quest to Find the Mother Who Gave Me Away

quote: Who told you that your journey is a thousand miles?
author: John Lomacang

quote: To find one’s purpose is to discover one’s worth, discern one’s direction, wholly dedicate oneself to the journey, and forge an unbending determination that I will not leave the world the way I found it. This week's blog outlines the finding of our purpose.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Achieve complete clarity as to what you intend to achieve, and develop a real 'knowing' of exactly where you would like to be in your life.
author: Kevin Michel, Moving Through Parallel Worlds To Achieve Your Dreams
category: ambitions, clarity, focus, goals, intention, self-help, success, winning

quote: Shoulds can masquerade as high standards or lofty goals, but they are not the same. Goals direct us from the inside, but shoulds are paralyzing judgments from the outside. Goals feel like authentic dreams while shoulds feel like oppressive obligations. Shoulds set up a false dichotomy between either meeting an ideal or being a failure, between perfection or settling. The tyranny of the should even pits us against our own best interests.
author: Meg Jay

quote: I believe in the possibility of positive change at every age and every stage of life. Your whole life is ahead of you.
author: Eleanor Brownn

quote: Set your sights so high that even failure has in it an echo of glory.
author: Anonymous

quote: A person who values their goals actually values their achievements.
author: Onyi Anyado
category: brainy-quote, business-quotes, entrepreneur, entrepreneur-quotes, entrepreneurship, entrepreneurship-quotes, goals, goals-quotes, harvard-business-review, leaders, leadership, leadership-development, leadership-quotes, onyi-anyado, quotes-of-the-day, quotes-to-live-by, richard-branson

author: Onyi Anyado
category: distinction, distinctive-footprints-of-life, entrepreneur, entrepreneur-quotes, entrepreneurship, entrepreneurship-quotes, goal-setting-tips, goals, goals-quotes, innovation, leadership, leadership-development, leadership-quotes, onyi-anyado, quotes-of-the-day, quotes-to-live-by, quotes-to-make-you-think, richard-branson, startup

quote: Most people just ‘hope’ to meet their targets, while few have clear and strong intention hence they achieve it.
author: Hina Hashmi, Your Life A Practical Guide to Happiness Peace and Fulfilment

quote: A goal is not just an object on a pitch
author: it is also a milestone on your journey of excellence.

quote: You can't achieve major goals with minimal work.

quote: A person who doesn't have a structured way of writing their goals will experience disorder, even in the comfort zone.

quote: Never forget why you should win or achieve your goals and dreams. Once you feel you are losing purpose in the process, remind yourself why you saw the need to begin in the first place, let that drive you.

quote: A dream is just as good, and will go as far as an action.

quote: Have goals, Chase dreams, but do not let your happiness depend on their acheivement.

quote: And speaking of options ,these kids [the ones who attend elite universities] have all been told that theirs are limitless. Once you commit to something, though, that ceases to be true. A former student sent me an essay he wrote, a few years after college, called "The Paradox of Potential." Yale students, he said, are like stem cells. They can be anything in the world, so they try to delay for as long as possible the moment when they have to become just one thing in particular. Possibility, paradoxically, becomes limitation.
author: William Deresiewicz, Excellent Sheep: The Miseducation of the American Elite and the Way to a Meaningful Life

quote: Very often, what is meant to be a stepping stone turns out to be a slab of wet cement that will harden around your foot if you do not take the next step soon enough.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: aid, ambition, design, destination, goals, hopes, intent, progress, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, step, stepping-stone

quote: There are so many people that use 'following your dreams' as an excuse to not work. When in reality, following your dreams, successfully, is nothing but work.

quote: One of the main tasks of adolescence is to achieve an identity—not necessarily a knowledge of who we are, but a clarification of the range of what we might become, a set of self-references by which we can make sense of our responses, and justify our decisions and goals.

category: adolescence, decisions, goals, identity, life, respponsibilities, values

quote: In order to reach our goals we sometimes need a plan B. Other times we go all the way through to plan Z.

quote: There are greater goals in life than material and sensual pleasures

quote: There's no such thing as a goal cast in stone. It should be a living thing that becomes a part of your life.

quote: You need alot of patient to keep working.It takes time for the goals to be realized.

quote: Stay committed and dedicated to your goals.

quote: When you say "Yes!" to your dream and do what you truly love to do, you are also transforming the world for the better.

quote: Do not postpone your happiness to "achievement" of goals. It is not worth postponing your happiness, even for a moment...Learn to "be happy" first, and then go about achieving your goals...

quote: Always do your best in whatever you do

quote: When you forget about the how, go back to the why.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: Take the challenge of your life.Reach out to your goals.There is no limit to what you can achieve.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita
category: achieve, achieve-your-dreams, achievement, achievement-and-attitude, achievement-attitude, achievements, achievements-success, achiever, achievers, challenge, challenges, challenging, challenging-people, challenging-perspectives, challenging-status-quo, chances, enthusiasm-and-attitude, enthusiasm-inspiration, future-plans, goal, goal-achievement, goal-of-life, goal-setting, goal-setting-tips, goal-success, goals, goals-and-plans, goals-in-life, goals-priorities, goals-quotes, higher-consciousness, higher-education, higher-learning, higher-life, higher-living, higher-power, limit, plans, reach-out, reaching, reaching-for-your-dreams, reaching-higher, reaching-out, reaching-out-to-other-women, reaching-out-to-people, reaching-your-goals, success, success-in-business, success-in-life, success-self-improvement, success-strategies, successful-mind, take-chances, your-destiny, your-journey, your-life, yourself

quote: Push yourself to the brink of exhaustion into the crossroads of excitement and anxiety. Embrace the risks taken, and never acknowledge the shadows of doubt that stretch across your path. It is only there where you will discover a personal success that exceeds the pictures painted in your dreams

quote: You'll be hard-pressed to reach your goals if you don't map out where you're going. Take time to navigate your life.

quote: Leadership: Converting dreams into goals and goals into success.
author: T Jay Taylor
category: coaching, dreams, goals, leadership, mentoring, success

quote: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
author: Venus Williams

quote: To lead people or influence them, we must first align ourselves with them. By identifying with individuals or groups, we gain their confidence and can then lead them into a higher understanding or direct them to the achievement of lofty goals.
author: Wu Wei, I Ching Wisdom: More Guidance from the Book of Answers, Volume Two
category: confidence, goals, guidance, i-ching, life, quotes, wisdom, wu-wei

quote: the only realistic choice is to follow your dreams
author: Ricky Yousuf

quote: Today is all you have.Pursue your goals.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita
category: goal-achievement, goal-of-life, goal-setting-tips, goal-success, goals, goals-in-life, goals-priorities, purpose-in-life, pursue, pursue-excellence, pursue-your-dreams, pursue-your-passion, pursuit, today, today-is-your-day, today-tomorrow

quote: My goals may seem impossibly far-fetched when really they're not.  Break them down into steps and see how I accomplish great things.  I can easily reach from A to B.  I can manage from B to C. I can then make it from C to D.  And so eventually, I will find my way from A to Z.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: ambition, dreams, goals, goals-in-life, one-step-at-a-time, reaching-goals, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, steps

quote: Cultivate the habit of setting clearly-defined written goals
author: they are the road maps that guide you to your destination.

quote: You need to set and have goals for your life.
author: Lailah GiftyAkita

quote: Never stop having doubts. If you ever do, it will be because you’ve stopped moving forward, and at that point, God will step in and pull the rug out from under your feet, because that is His way of controlling His chosen ones, by making sure they always follow their appointed path to the end. If, for any reason, we stop, whether out of complacency, laziness, or out of a mistaken belief that we know enough, He forces us on.
author: Paulo Coelho, Brida

quote: Having this, we want that.Owning some, we want more.Standing here, we wish to be there.If it's impossible, we struggle to make it happen.Why are we like this? Why not be content with some, here, and now? Why is enough not enough? Because humans are ambitious creatures not meant to be idle or fruitless. We strive to learn, to grow, to achieve, to amass; therefore, we will never be content.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: ambition, appetite, desire, determination, drive, goals, humanity, humans, purposeful, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, stubborn

quote: Don't give up.I know you've made a thousand attempts to reach your goal, but look at it this way: after repeatedly banging your head against the wall, you ought to be numb enough break through this time.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: attempts, determination, goals, never-give-up, perseverence, resolve, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, tries

quote: You can write and visualize goals all you want, but if you do not take action, your goals will never become a reality. To obtain a goal you have never before achieved will require tasks you have never before done.
author: Cameron C. Taylor, 8 Attributes of Great Achievers
category: action, goal-setting, goals, hard-work, hard-work-effort, hard-working, success, writing-goals

quote: Those focused on the future don't complain about their past
author: those complaining about their past aren't focused on their futures.

quote: To many people fall short of their goals because they mistakenly believe that losing is just another comfortable place to sit.
author: Johnnie Dent Jr.
category: falling-short, goal-setting, goals, losing, perseverance, winning

quote: There is great power in goals and dreams.
author: Cameron C. Taylor, 8 Attributes of Great Achievers

quote: A goal that is not written is not a goal. It only becomes real when you write it down.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: As part of an effort to prod college seniors to get tetanus shots, a group of students was given a lecture meant to educate them about the dangers of tetanus and the importance of getting inoculated against it. A large majority of those students reported that they were convinced and planned to get their shots, but in the end only 3 percent got them. Bu another group of students, who were presented with the same lecture, had a 28 percent inoculation rate. The difference? The second group was given a map of the campus and asked to plan their route to the health center and pick a date and time to go. Sometimes, you see, motivation isn't our problem. Rather, we need to identify life's everyday mental obstacles - regret, fatigue, overconfidence, fear, to name just four - and put ourselves into position to hurdle them.
author: Gary Belsky, Why Smart People Make Big Money Mistakes and How to Correct Them: Lessons from the Life-Changing Science of Behavioral Economics

quote: Most worldly goals for so-called success are soul traps similar to quicksand.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: I wake up every morning thinking about all the great things I am going to accomplish that day, and I go to bed every night thinking about all the even greater things I’m going to have to accomplish tomorrow to make up for the nothing I did today.
author: John A. Ashley

quote: You set goals in order to become the person it takes to achieve them
author: Linda Deir

quote: If I must start somewhere, right here and now is the best place imaginable.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: beginnings, do-it, dreams, goals, hopes, just-do-it, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, starting, starting-over

quote: Today is a BRAND NEW day—a perfectly good reason to get up and start over. Never give up.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: determination, goals, never-give-up, new-day, persistence, resolve, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, start-over, try

quote: The harder the fight, the greater the victory.
author: Chris Burkmenn
category: dreams, encouragement, faith, fight, goals, greater, victory, work

quote: In order to be written into History
author: one must first change it.

quote: To me, Hell isn’t a place; it’s a state of mind. It is a psychological self-imprisonment in which fear is the warden. It is a result of not living in alignment with your goals, dreams, and purpose. It is to find yourself in the endless emotional agony of, “What if?
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The sky is never falling...things will work out, they ALWAYS work out. Stay focused, accept everything as perfect and keep moving forward toward the direction of your goals.
author: Mike Basevic, No Limits, Mastering the Mental Edge
category: acceptance, advice, focus, goals, inspirational, life-lessons, mental-edge, motivational, no-limits, perfect, performance-coaching, wisdom, work-out

quote: Stop using, "easier said than done", as an excuse to not change! Bringing your life to a higher level is challenging; get over it and rise to the challenge!
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Stop blaming other people and circumstances for killing your dreams. The truth is; we tend to talk ourselves out of acting upon our dreams. Most dreams die of suicide, not murder.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: If you can see the vision of your goal clearly, you can plan and map effectively, and navigate efficiently.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Don't stop after you reach your goals
author: aim to surpass them!

quote: One does not advance when one walks toward no goal, or - which is the same thing - when his goal is infinity.
author: Émile Durkheim, On Suicide: A Study in Sociology

quote: MOTHER TIME: We all get the exact same 365 days. The only difference is what we do with them.
author: Hillary DePiano, New Year's Thieve
category: goals, holiday, inspirational, new-year, new-year-s, new-year-s-eve, new-year-s-resolutions, new-years, new-years-eve, resolutions, tradition, traditions, year

quote: There are always periodic opportunities to give up, while every single moment is an opportunity to persevere.
author: Dean F. Wilson

quote: MOTHER TIME: Every New Year is the same. Every day, every second is too for that matter. But when we deliver them in secret, when another year just begins as a matter of fact, it's easy to fail to appreciate what a miracle it is to have more time. So, I suppose, it feels different right now because this time you're paying attention
author: Hillary DePiano, New Year's Thieve
category: goals, gratitude, holiday, inspirational, new-year, new-year-s, new-year-s-eve, new-year-s-resolutions, new-years, new-years-eve, paying-attention, reflecting, reflection, resolutions, time, tradition, traditions, year

quote: The key to success―keep swimming. Even when they tap you on the shoulder to say the pool has been drained, just keep swimming.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: achievement, aim, determination, drive, focus, fortitude, goals, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, success, swimming

quote: MURRY: Resolutions are a complete waste of time. They're just this meaningless ritual, empty promises we make and break within hours of each other.
author: Hillary DePiano, New Year's Thieve
category: goals, holiday, new-year, new-year-s, new-year-s-eve, new-year-s-resolutions, new-years, new-years-eve, promise, promises, resolutions, tradition, traditions

quote: Where there's a will, there's a way. Perhaps tomorrow, if not today.
author: Michele Jennae

quote: Short wins does not guarantee long victories.
author: Krishna Sagar

quote: MURRY: Why do we even celebrate the New Year? It's just this arbitrary quirk of how we measure time in years, right? Midnight tonight is the very same transition from day to day that we do every 24 hours. But this thing in my hands, it feels real in a way the numbered calendar box never does. Why? What makes midnight tonight any different?
author: Hillary DePiano, New Year's Thieve
category: goals, holiday, midnight, new-year, new-year-s, new-year-s-eve, new-year-s-resolutions, new-years, new-years-eve, resolutions, tradition, traditions

quote: If a person is living out his Personal Legend, he knows everything he needs to know. There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: Change words like difficult/impossible/unrealistic to words like challenging/fun/daring/exciting, and then get back to working/playing/competing/winning
author: Jamie Valentin
category: accomplishment, accomplishments, aspirations, attitude, direction, dreams, faith, goals, hope, plans, purpose, success, vision

quote: What you need to know is this: before a dream is realized, the Soul of the World tests everything that was learned along the way. It does this not because it is evil, but so that we can, in addition to realizing our dreams, master the lessons we've learned as we've moved toward the dream. That's the point at which most people give up. It's the point at which, as we say in the language of the desert, one dies of thirst just when the palm trees have appeared on the horizon.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: MURRY: It's not that, it's just… I don't really get it. I usually find myself staring at the midnight deadline filled with regrets both for opportunities and loved ones missed. It's another day closer to the end. The last thing I feel like doing is counting down to some wild celebration. It just seems so sad to say goodbye to a year and know that it’s gone forever and you can’t go back to it. Not to relive, not to correct.NOEL: I've never thought about it that way.MURRY: There's something so final about it. It's the period at the end of the sentence.NOEL: The New Year's resolution.
author: Hillary DePiano, New Year's Thieve
category: goals, holiday, new-year, new-year-s, new-year-s-eve, new-year-s-resolutions, new-years, new-years-eve, resolutions, tradition, traditions

quote: NOEL: And even when I don't stay up until midnight, I still enjoy the tradition of New Year's resolutions. What can I say? I like setting personal goals and challenging myself to improve. I suppose I could do it on any day of the year, but the New Year is as good a day as any. It's a fresh start.
author: Hillary DePiano, New Year's Thieve
category: goals, holiday, new-year, new-year-s, new-year-s-eve, new-year-s-resolutions, new-years, new-years-eve, resolutions, tradition, traditions

quote: If someone tells you that you can't do it, then prove to yourself that you can. You don't need somebody else's word for it, you just need yours.
author: Exlibris_keagan

quote: Stay focused, accept everything as perfect and keep moving forward toward the direction of your goals.
author: Mike Basevic, No Limits, Mastering the Mental Egde: The Class They Don't Teach You in School

quote: You don't have to know how you are going to accomplish your goals, you just have to know that you will.
author: Mike Basevic, No Limits, Mastering the Mental Egde: The Class They Don't Teach You in School

quote: Goals that are not frightening are not worth having.
author: Tina Brown

quote: Who told these people with dreams, goals and ambitions they could take time off?
author: Darnell Lamont Walker
category: ambition, dreams, goals, hustling, life, work, working

quote: In essence, individuals more concerned with portraying their own uniqueness were more likely to select an alcoholic beverage not yet ordered at their table in an effort to demonstrate that they were in fact one of a kind. What these results show is that people are sometimes willing to sacrifice the pleasure they get from a particular consumption experience in order to project a certain image to others. When people order food and drinks, they seem to have two goals: to order what they will enjoy most and to portray themselves in a positive light in the eyes of their friends.
author: Dan Ariely, Predictably Irrational: The Hidden Forces That Shape Our Decisions

quote: To spend your time wanting things is to smother your time for achieving things beyond your expectations.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy
category: achieve, action, compensation, desire, expectation, goals, inspirational, motivational, smother, success, want

quote: On his thirteenth birthday he had seen a film in which the central character was a painter who, unable to sell his work, grew cold and hungry as he went from one unsuccessful interview to the next; eventually he had become a vagrant, sleeping in the streets of the city where once he had walked in hope. Hawksmoor left the cinema in a mood of profound, terrified apprehension and, from that time, he was filled with a sense of time passing and with the fear that he might be left discarded on its banks. The fear had not left him, although now he could no longer remember from where it came: he looked back on his earlier life without curiosity, since it seemed to lack intrinsic interest, and when he looked forward he saw the same steady attainment of goals without any joy in their attainment. For him, the state of happiness was simply the state of not suffering and, if he cared for anything, it was for oblivion.
author: Peter Ackroyd, Hawksmoor
category: achievements, anxiety, goals, life, oblivion, time

quote: Results fuel belief which causes us to take more action and get more results.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: Many people see a brick wall as an obstacle, when it's really a how to for success. You build both, one brick at a time.
author: Rob Liano
category: build, dreams, goals, hard-work, inspiration, love, motivation, obstacles, overcoming, steps, success-steps

quote: We are all ghosts," Morris Klapper said at last. "We are conceived in a moment of death and born out of ghost wombs, and we play in the streets with other little ghosts, chanting ghost-rhymes and scratching to become real. We are told that life is full of goals and that, although it is sadly necessary to fight, you can at least choose your war. But we learn that for ghosts there can only be one battle: to become real. A few of us make it, thus encouraging other ghosts to believe it can be done.
author: Peter S. Beagle, A Fine and Private Place
category: battle, ghosts, goals, morris-klapper, necessary-to-fight, real, to-become-real, war

quote: There is a big difference between being centered and being self-centered
author: Lolly Daskal

quote: If you are setting a goal without understanding the reason for it, then maybe you should reevaluate the goal in general.
author: Tina Brown

quote: Get out of your own way... stop the paralysis by analysis... dream your dream... then, WAKE UP and bring it to life!
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The only way to get to where you want to go is to ruthlessly evaluate your where you are now. The key here is that your biggest obstacle in life is always yourself—not external factors.
author: Isaiah Hankel, Black Hole Focus: How Intelligent People Can Create a Powerful Purpose for Their Lives
category: goal-setting, goals, mindset, mindset-for-business-success, mindset-mastery, purpose, purpose-in-life

quote: One by one, I'll face the tasks before me and complete them as best I can. Focusing on each stride forward, but at the same time taking a long-range view, scanning the scenery as far ahead as I can. I am, after all, a long distance runner.My time, the rank I attain, my outward appearance - all of these are secondary. For a runner like me, what's really important is reaching the goal I set myself, under my own power. I give it everything I have, endure what needs enduring, and am able, in my own way, to be satisfied. From out of the failures and joys I always try to come away having grasped a concrete lesson. (It's got to be concrete, no matter how small it is.) And I hope that, over time, as one race follows another, in the end I'll reach a place I'm content with. Or maybe just catch a glimpse of it.
author: Haruki Murakami, What I Talk About When I Talk About Running

quote: There’s only one kind of girl I can tolerate being, and it is not the Girl Who Gives it All Up for Love.
author: J.C. Lillis, We Won't Feel a Thing

quote: Don’t fear experience. Embrace each one as a gift, a teacher, a step to get closer to where you want to be and who you want to become.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: The dreams that were buried the deepest were the hardest to get rid of.
author: Michelle M. Pillow, The Barbarian Prince

quote: You are the magical fairy that makes things happen in your life. Don't wait for someone else to make your dreams come true.
author: Natalie Rivener

quote: One's longing is not so much there for sense-gratification, profit and self-preservation, instead one's karma is there for no other purpose than inquiring after the Absolute Truth.
author: Ramesh Menon, Bhagavata Purana
category: dreams, fun, goals, god, life, longing, religion

quote: Dharma – the foundation of all human goals be,Refers to obligations, conduct, moral duties;- 25 -
author: Munindra Misra, Goals of Life
category: conduct, dharma, duty, goals, hindu, hinduism, hinduism-from-maya-to-moksha, life, moral, obligations

quote: Kama purusharth advocates desires fulfilled be,Albeit in awareness, without harming anybody;
author: Munindra Misra, Goals of Life
category: desires, goals, hindu, hinduism, hinduism-from-maya-to-moksha, kama, life, misra, munindra

quote: If Brahman an infinite ocean, then Atma a wave within be,Ocean not different from its waves, the waves as ocean be;They are but one and the same very similar in actuality,So Brahman and Atma are one and the same in reality.960
author: Munindra Misra, Goals of Life
category: atma, brahman, goals, hindu, hinduism, life, maya, misra, munindra

quote: Whatever you want in life, do one thing every day which brings you a little closer towards attainment of your goal.  Even if it means spending a few minutes. No matter how small the effort is, if done consistently, it will start compounding and before you know it, you would have already realized your dream.
author: Zeeshan Raza, U Turn Your Life: 5 Simple Steps to Achieve Success – Starting Now!

quote: Living in Supreme Influence, your language is neutral and/or moving toward your vision rather than moving away. In other words, you speak about what you do want, not about what you don't want.
author: Niurka, Supreme Influence: Change Your Life with the Power of the Language You Use
category: communication, goals, inspiration, language, life, vision

quote: The only people who experience no resistance are the unambitious and the dead. If you feel no resistance in your life, you need greater goals or you need to check your pulse. Life and movement come with resistance. Don’t be discouraged by it, be strengthened by it.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: One can never rack up his goals mere through hard-work, there is a thing in this world which is known as self-confidence.
author: M.H. Rakib, The Cavalier
category: aims, confidence, goals, hardwork, life, to-rack-up

quote: Stop putting off today madam
author: you'll find that all those forgotten tomorrows have piled up into a bunch of old yesterdays.

quote: When your resources are focused on what has been you cannot create all that can still be.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: The difference between greed and goals is what you are prepared to handle...
author: Garrett McCoy

quote: Q: I want to be an author when I grow up. Am I insane?"Neil Gaiman: "Yes. Growing up is highly overrated. Just be an au
author: Neil Gaiman
category: aspirations, authors, goals, goals-in-life, growing-up, writers

quote: Keep going even when the going is slow and uncertain.Make your dream your prayer and your service.Don’t wait for recognition. Let it find you working. Romanticize authenticity instead of perfection.
author: G.G. Renee Hill
category: authenticity, determination, dreams, goals, greatness, hard-work, motivation, perfection, perfectionism, recognition, resilience

quote: When you want to arrive at your goal more than you want to be doing what you're doing, you become stressed.
author: Eckhart Tolle, A New Earth: Awakening to Your Life's Purpose

quote: Maybe not here and now, but somewhere, someday.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: Your definition of a good life does not have to look like everyone else thinks it should. Whatever feels right for you, whatever aligns your inside with your outside, that's what you should spend your time doing.
author: G.G. Renee Hill
category: alignment, dreams, fulfillment, goals, good-life, happiness, life, passion, peace, purpose

quote: Everything begins with failing. If you stop to fail, then your failing to stop, to try and try again, and bring success.
author: Anthony Liccione
category: dont-give-up, dreams, endure, failure, goals, letting-go, plans, success, try-and-try-again, work-hard

quote: Your problem is in thinking the sky's the limit. Why set limits?
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: aims, ambition, dreams, goals, hopes, limits, objectives, objectives-of-life, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, target, wishes

quote: The goal was never dependent on the route that took me there. It was always dependent on the heart that got me through whatever route opened itself up to my efforts.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing

quote: Goals are only ever a guide; a winding, changing path. It's your heart that will really keep you on tack... and nourished along the way.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru
category: acceptance, finding-your-path-in-life, following-your-heart, goals, inspiring-quotes-on-life, letting-go, life-path, quotes-on-goals, quotes-on-happiness, rasheed-ogunlaru-quotes, setting-goals

quote: World is full of people waiting to pursue their passion, if given a chance. Unfortunately, the "chance" will not be given, it needs to be earned.
author: Manoj Arora, From the Rat Race to Financial Freedom

quote: The difference between superlative pie and a wish for cake is crust. Understand that pie is a generous but self-centered substance. It likes attention, not affection. Do not hug your crust. Do not rub its back or five its high. Don't fuss with refrigerators every step oft he way. Keep the water and butter cold, and remember what a wise baker once said: The goal is pie.
author: Kate Lebo, A Commonplace Book of Pie
category: baking, beginnings, cake, crust, goals, pastry, pie, poetry, prose-poetry

quote: Sometimes we make being happy so difficult.And being thankful such a chore. Starting the day like a job we hate. Beginning it like swallowing ten tablespoons of devil made cough syrup.Because, somehow, along the way, we forget that being alive and healthy and happy are noble goals – or just good ideas.And that the opposite of being alive is being dead. What a choice.
author: Carew Papritz, The Legacy Letters: his Wife, his Children, his Final Gift
category: be-happy, being-alive, being-dead, book-quotes, carew-papritz, goals, happiness, healthy, inspirational-quote, the-legacy-letters

quote: A little here and a little there will always accumulate, so why be surprised when steady, small steps take you to great places?
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: accumulate, achievements, goals, progress, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, small-steps, step-by-step

quote: Every day is precious. You will never live THIS day again. It is ONE event in human history. Why not make it count? Time is a nonrenewable resource.
author: Kristen Lamb

quote: When you have a goal, there will also be a result.
author: Mohiro Kitoh, Kare no Satsujin Keikaku

quote: Today I will do one small task that will contribute toward the achievement of a life goal.
author: Kitt Weagant, Each Day a New Beginning: Daily Meditations for Women

quote: You miss 100% of the shots that you don't take. Still wondering whether it is worth giving a shot at your dreams?
author: Manoj Arora, From the Rat Race to Financial Freedom

quote: Whenever you think seriously to achieve something, just take one advise : Think on Paper
author: Manoj Arora, From the Rat Race to Financial Freedom

quote: If your dreams and goals get derailed, they're not dead. Derailed simply means off-track. Pick 'em up and put 'em back on again.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing

quote: Just like going to the moon made us learn more about earth, achieving your goals will make you learn more about yourself and get fascinated.
author: Samer Chidiac

quote: Starting a new way is never easy so...keep starting until the start sticks.
author: Tim Fargo
category: achievement, achievements-and-attitude, beginnings, finding-your-way, finding-yourself, goal, goal-setting, goals, inspiration, inspirational, motivation, motivational, motivational-quote, renew, renewal, seeking

quote: I chase goals, not girls.
author: Amit Kalantri
category: 20th-century, 20th-century-quotes, arrogance, attitude, chase, chasing-love, fun, funny, funny-quotes, girl, girls, goal, goal-setting, goals, human, humans, inspiration, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, love-hurts, modern, modern-quotations, modernism, modernity, motivation, motivational, motivational-quotes, philosophy, pride, proud, wisdom, wisdom-quotes, wit, witty, witty-quotes

quote: We're going to change. We're going to throw out what's worse in usand keep what's best. But come hell or high water, we three will sticktogether, all for one, one for all. We're going to grow, Cathy,physically, mentally, and emotionally. Not only that, we're going toreach the goals we've set for ourselves.
